items.question: What receipt data can your OCR extract?
items.answer: Our AI extracts merchant name, transaction date, invoice/receipt number, subtotal, tax amount, total amount, payment method, and individual line items (products, quantities, prices). We also capture currency symbols and tip amounts when present.

items.question: How accurate is receipt OCR on faded thermal paper?
items.answer: Our AI is specifically trained on real-world receipts including faded thermal paper. We achieve 95%+ accuracy even on receipts up to 6 months old with fading. For best results, take photos in good lighting and avoid shadows on the receipt.

items.question: Can I export extracted receipt data to Excel?
items.answer: Yes! Copy-paste directly into Excel or Google Sheets, or download as CSV format. The data is structured with columns for merchant, date, total, tax, and category—ready for import into any spreadsheet or accounting software.

items.question: Does your receipt scanner handle foreign currency?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our OCR recognizes 25+ currencies including USD ($), EUR (€), GBP (£), CAD (C$), AUD (A$), JPY (¥), and many others. We capture the currency symbol along with amounts for accurate international expense tracking.

items.question: Can your OCR read handwritten tips on restaurant receipts?
items.answer: Yes! Our advanced AI recognizes handwritten numbers including tip amounts and adjusted totals on restaurant receipts. We achieve 85-90% accuracy on clear handwriting, helping you capture the complete transaction amount.

items.question: How does receipt scanning help with tax deductions?
items.answer: The IRS requires receipts for deductions over $75. Our OCR digitizes receipts instantly, creating searchable records. Export categorized expenses (meals, travel, office supplies) to make tax prep faster and audit-proof with proper documentation.

items.question: What receipt formats do you support?
items.answer: We accept JPG, PNG, PDF, and HEIC files from phone photos, email attachments, or digital receipts. We process standard 3-inch thermal receipts, long itemized receipts, restaurant bills, gas station receipts, taxi receipts, and more.

items.question: Is my financial data secure when scanning receipts?
items.answer: Completely secure. Receipts are processed over encrypted connections and deleted immediately after extraction. We never store your financial data or images. Our privacy-first architecture ensures your expense information remains confidential.
